name: Eat or be eaten
description:
Eat or be eaten

Is a little game and also a first time game for 1 of us in the team (we are 2 people) and we are slowly learning more and more in the game making world! 
and we decided to publish our first game and all our other games while we are progressing in our skills of gamedev!
Try it out and feeback is appreciated! 

The game itself is about eating fish while a shark is after you, there's 3 levels, and a shark will be added for each level! its not much much but we focused on learning the basics of a lot things! 

short little fun game!

have a great day!

sincerly LittleSchoon!
